## allQueensSurrounded() function

Determine if all queens of the given color are completely surrounded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function allQueensSurrounded(board: GameBoard, color: Color): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

color


</td><td>

[Color](./hive-lib.color.md)


</td><td>

The color queen to look for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if all six coordinates surrounding each queen of the given color on the board is occupied, false otherwise. Returns true if there are no queens of the given color on the board.
